channel.title: Burak's Data Blog
channel.description: This is just another blog about statistics, R and data science etc.

item.title: How I got here?
item.description: As someone with zero experience writing blogpost etc., Yihui Xie’s minimal example helped me a lot to start blogging. Normally, it can be quite tedious to work with a Jekyll-based blog for someone like me. However, Yihui’s example explains you how to build a Jekyll website which uses knitr and Rmarkdown. By the way, I wanted to use Jekyll because I want to include R code to my blog posts. Also, I was lucky and I had experience with knitr and Rmarkdown before. Finally, with the help of Rstudio, the road for blogging with Jekyll is open for many more R users, I believe!
